_description: Osbern Bokenham, General Prologue to Bokenam’s Lives of Saints — 240 lines

BLAru327.First Lines:
Two thingys owyth euery clerkTo aduertysyn begynyng a
                    werk…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…In wych place vs bothe to dwelleThe lord vs graunte that
                    harwyd helle. Amen
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
